channel.title: Multimedia on NATURE.IN.PARADISE
channel.description: Recent content in Multimedia on NATURE.IN.PARADISE

item.title: Film Projects
item.description:
Explore some of the video content I’ve produced for individuals and organizations. I’m always happy to collaborate on a multimedia project! Feel free to contact me if you’re interested.
Alliance for a Sustainable Amazon: Join the Research Internship Program Smithsonian Sleepover: thank you to volunteers Wildlands Studies: Conservation Program in Peru Scaling Ice: Climbing with the Dartmouth Mountaineering Club

item.title: Help restore the Amazon
item.description: Check out the video I put together on the Alliance for a Sustainable Amazon’s Research Internship Program. A very cool experience! Learn more at www.sustainableamazon.org.
